alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 27 at 6:44PM PST until February 28 at 2:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 2 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 to 55 mph expected. East below the San Gorgonio Pass. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire, San Bernardino County Mountains and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. Strongest gusts near and below the Cajon and San Gorgonio Passes, and along the coastal foothills of the San Bernardino Mountains. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 2 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
